message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your time, Alice. I've done some research and I think the product is worth $9,000 to me. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,000 is still a bit low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $9,250.  This is a fair price, considering the value of the product to you. What do you say?
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not sure I'm willing to pay $9,250. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $9,100. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
